ðŸ“– Summary: Hawk-eye is a command-line tool that scans various data sources, including file systems, cloud storage (S3, GCS, Firebase), and databases (MySQL, Redis), for PII and secrets. It uses advanced text analysis and OCR to delve into various document formats, providing comprehensive data protection across platforms.
